com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal

Interface PacketHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonPacketHandler, PacketHandlerHooked, ProtocolLibPacketHandler

    public interface PacketHandler
    All the methods needed for internally handling the packet sending and receiving

      • onEnable

        boolean onEnable()
        Called when this Packet Handler has to be enabled. This method should take care of registering packet hooks or listeners.
        Returns:
        True if the handler successfully enabled, False if not

      • onDisable

        boolean onDisable()
        Called when this Packet Handler has to be disabled. This method should take care of removing any packet hooks or listeners.
        Returns:
        True if the handler successfully disabled, False if not
